Class UBossBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ryandw11.ultrabar.api.UBossBar

  • public class UBossBar
extends java.lang.Object
    Any active boss bar on the server.

    2.1

    • Constructor Detail

      • UBossBar

        public UBossBar(BossBarBuilder bbb,
                org.bukkit.boss.BossBar bar,
                @Nullable
                BossBarTimer timer)
        Create a new UBossBar.

        This is only meant for internal and advanced use. Please use BossBarBuilder to create boss bars.

        Parameters:
        bbb - The instance of the builder.
        bar - The instance of the Bukkit Boss Bar.
        timer - The time (Can be null)

        public int getTime()
        Get the time of the boss bar.

        This is the time that the bar originally started with. This will not present the time left.

        Returns:
        The time of the boss bar. (In Seconds).

      • setPlayers

      • removePlayer

        public void removePlayer(org.bukkit.entity.Player p)
        A way to remove players as #remove does not work on Collections.

        Use updatePlayers() to sync the player list.

        Parameters:
        p - The player.

      • updatePlayers

        public void updatePlayers()
        Update the list of players on the live bar.

        This must be called if you want players to be added / removed from the actual boss bar.
